kv17.4:1.3_0: Indriyabaddhaññeva aniccaṁ saṅkhataṁ paṭiccasamuppannaṁ khayadhammaṁ vayadhammaṁ virāgadhammaṁ nirodhadhammaṁ vipariṇāmadhammanti?
kv17.4:1.5_0: nanu anindriyabaddhaṁ aniccaṁ saṅkhataṁ paṭiccasamuppannaṁ khayadhammaṁ vayadhammaṁ virāgadhammaṁ nirodhadhammaṁ vipariṇāmadhammanti?
kv17.4:1.7_0: Hañci anindriyabaddhaṁ aniccaṁ saṅkhataṁ paṭiccasamuppannaṁ khayadhammaṁ vayadhammaṁ virāgadhammaṁ nirodhadhammaṁ vipariṇāmadhammaṁ,
kv17.4:4.3_0: Nanu yadaniccaṁ taṁ dukkhaṁ vuttaṁ bhagavatā—
kv17.4:4.6_0: Hañci yadaniccaṁ taṁ dukkhaṁ vuttaṁ bhagavatā—
kv17.4:4.7_0: “anindriyabaddhaṁ aniccaṁ”, no ca vata re vattabbe—
kv17.4:5.4_0: Yathā indriyabaddhassa dukkhassa pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṁ vussati,
kv17.4:5.4_1: evamevaṁ anindriyabaddhassa dukkhassa pariññāya bhagavati brahmacariyaṁ vussatīti?
kv17.4:5.6_0: yathā indriyabaddhaṁ dukkhaṁ pariññātaṁ na puna uppajjati,
kv17.4:5.6_1: evamevaṁ anindriyabaddhaṁ dukkhaṁ pariññātaṁ na puna uppajjatīti?
